sense.gloss: the meaning of a phrase (riddle, etc.)
heart, mind, spirit, vitality, inner strength
bottom of one's heart, core (of one's character), nature
center, centre, middle, heart, core, focus, pivot, emphasis, balance
peace of mind, relief, (sense of) security, safety, assurance, confidence
zealous, enthusiastic, ardent, fervent, keen, eager
from the bottom of one's heart, heartily, sincerely
(mental) attitude, way of thinking, attention, care, prudence, intention
city centre (center) (esp. capital city), urban centre, heart of city a metropolis
state of mind, mental state, mental attitude
sentiment, emotions, one's feelings, one's heart
inner thoughts, real intention, inmost heart, one's mind
at heart, deep down, on the inside

x: 執務心得・しつむこころえ

sense.gloss: middle of a nest of boxes
obtaining peace of mind through faith or ascetic practice

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓よりも↑物知↑↓ものし↓りな↑数学↑↓すうがく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のことをはっきりと↑表現↑↓ひょうげん↓できていないのを↑見↑↓み↓るのは↑心地↑↓ここち↓の↑良↑↓よ↓いものではない。
sdata.e: I don't like it when mathematicians who know much more than I do can't express themselves explicitly.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑好奇↑↓こうき↓↑心↑↓しん↓が↑強↑↓つよ↓いです。
sdata.e: I am curious.

sdata.e: I am curious.

sdata.j: ↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓しないで、↑楽↑↓たの↓しくいこう！
sdata.e: Don't worry, be happy!

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓っているわけではないんだよ。
sdata.e: The world doesn't revolve around you.

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓はお↑前↑↓まえ↓↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓ってるわけじゃないんだよ。
sdata.e: The world doesn't revolve around you.

sdata.e: My heart was filled with happiness.

sdata.j: ↑心↑↓こころ↓↑熱↑↓ねつ↓けれど↑肉体↑↓にくたい↓は↑弱↑↓よわ↓し。

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑心↑↓こころ↓ないことをしたものだ。

sdata.e: You work hard.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑決心↑↓けっしん↓しなければならない。しかも↑今↑↓いま↓すぐにだ。
sdata.e: You must make up your mind, and that at once.

sdata.e: You should study harder.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑熱心↑↓ねっしん↓に↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓しなければならない。
